structure.unit: Officers And Inmates Of Penal And Reformatory Institutions. Paroles And Pardons

law.catch_line: Removal Of Prisoners Convicted And Sentenced By United States Court
law.text: The commissioner may remove from one jail or house of correction to another, or to any correctional institution of the commonwealth a prisoner convicted and sentenced by a United States court and thereafter transferred by the Attorney General of the United States to such jail or house of correction.
